brief_summary.textblock:
Follow up via ultrasonic abdoman after patients who were giagnosed and treated as
      periappendicular abcess and refused to be operated later on in the "interval period ". To
      ass what occured to their appendics ?

clinical_study.brief_title: Follow up by US Following Hospitalization With Periappendicular Abscess Refusing to be Operated on Within a Few Weeks.

detailed_description.textblock:
During the last 10 years patients were hospitalized and treated with antibiotics due to the
      diagnosis of periappendicular abcess. they were invited to be operate after wards
      -appendectomy, electively few weeks later on. All these patients refused to be operated.
      What happend to their appendics few months or years later on via ultrasonic abdomen view??

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  All patients diagnosed in the last 10 years suffering from periappendicular abcess.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  after appendectomy

study_pop.textblock: All patients diagnosed in the last 10 years suffering from periappendicular abcess.

overall_official.affiliation: Hillel Yaffe Medical Center, Infectious Diseases Unit

primary_outcome.measure: Size and Condition of the Appendix.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Prospective
